items.sentence: We\'ve spent every Christmas for the last thirty years together.
You\'ll find that book in the historical section of the library.
Although Tom is sick, he plans to get his homework done on time.
I\'d like to discuss this with my wife before making a decision.
My suggestion is for more trees to be planted along the streets.
At the edge of the forest, I met a tall man in a hunting outfit.
I thought you said you could finish writing the report by today.
Tom always uses the rice cooker that he brought back from Japan.
Tom and I went to the same high school. He was a year behind me.
Specialists are people who have only one string on their violin.
The doctor told Tom to lower the amount of red meat that he ate.
The apples from the tree behind Tom\'s house are very delicious.
Tom bought that car for three thousand dollars three months ago.
Tom can speak French better than any other student in his class.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to get the raise he\'d asked for.
If I\'d known Tom was going to be in Boston, I\'d have told you.
If Tom\'s girlfriend knew he was here now, she\'d be very angry.
There may be other alternatives that we haven\'t thought of yet.
I never expected to find such a nice hotel in a place like this.
I ought to have enough money saved up to buy a car by Christmas.
I plan to move back to Boston since my whole family lives there.
I saw the look on your face when Tom asked you to wait for Mary.
It\'s possible that we won\'t be able to eat tuna in the future.
I congratulate you on winning first prize in the speech contest.
Tom promised to meet Mary at the usual time and the usual place.
There are three empty rooms. However, we can\'t use any of them.
Those books look as if they\'re going to topple over any minute.
I don\'t see why Tom wouldn\'t want to go to the dance with you.
Tom thought the house Mary wanted to buy was a little too small.
If Tom would smile more often, he\'d probably have more friends.
If you have any questions, please don\'t hesitate to contact me.
Tom\'s parents thought that he was too young to live by himself.
Who knows, maybe Christmas in Boston won\'t be so bad after all.
Let\'s go to my place. There\'s something I\'d like to show you.
Tom and Mary were both fatter three years ago than they are now.
I\'m sure Tom will forgive you if you explain everything to him.
The last time our family got together was three Christmases ago.
The person standing in line immediately in front of Tom is Mary.
Why did you ask Tom to do that when you knew he couldn\'t do it?
As soon as Tom walked out the door, the police started shooting.
Company regulations mandate that workers use protective eyewear.
Tom is beginning to recover, but he\'s not out of the woods yet.
Tom asked me if I knew what time the meeting was going to start.
Tom ate a Japanese-style breakfast for the first time yesterday.
I asked Mary why she never got remarried after her husband died.
Have you decided where you\'re going to celebrate Christmas Eve?
Tom will probably buy his mother some flowers for Mother\'s Day.
I give you everything you ask for, but you never seem satisfied.
I just want to make sure you live up to your end of the bargain.
I think that French is the most beautiful language in the world.
